item.title: 65K North Carolina Voters Must Prove Identity Or Have Ballots Thrown Out In Supreme Court Race
item.description: The battle for the state Supreme Court seat is unlikely to be over.

item.title: Despite Measures To Protect Women’s Sports, Girls Are Still Being Forced To Play Against Boys
item.description: Even after President Donald Trump's executive order, boys are still playing in girls' sports. Lawmakers need to step up.

item.title: No, The Senate Shouldn’t Let Even More Unaccountable Bureaucrats Decide What The Law Says
item.description: Senate Republicans obviously shouldn’t outsource their legislative prerogatives to the parliamentarian.

item.title: ‘State-Enabled Kidnapping’: Colorado Democrat Bill Would Give Custody Of Kids To Parents Who Push Trans Mutilation
item.description: Colorado has become a 'transition' mill for crazed parents who use the 'transgender' identification of their children as a weapon in custody battles.

item.title: Here’s How The Media Are Lying Right Now: Tariffs ‘A Tax On Consumers’ Edition
